full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MO 'DRE KHA BSGYUR BA'I BCOS THABS BYA TSUL SGYU MA'I MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES MO 'DRE KHA BSGYUR GYI BCOS THABS BYA TSUL SGYU MA'I MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGON GYI YIG RNYING LA GZHI BYAS TE, THOG MTHAR SBYOR RGYU'I LAN LAG 'GA' RE RNAMS KHUNGS THUB KYI YIG CHA RNAMS DANG GO BSTUN TE, BKLAG CHOG TU BKOD PA PO NI SER GZUGS MEE TREE MING CAN GYIS 'BRIS PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
